parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per finding per visit per subject

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: SSSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: SSGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Perhaps pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database. Example: Line number from the procedure or test page.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SSSPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124305

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the status assessment described in SSTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in SSTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST"). SSTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Example: SURVSTAT
datasetVariables.label: Status Short Name
datasetVariables.name: SSTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124306

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSTEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the status assessment used to obtain the finding. The value in SSTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Example: Survival Status
datasetVariables.label: Status Name
datasetVariables.name: SSTEST

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to categorize observations across subjects.
datasetVariables.label: Category for Assessment
datasetVariables.name: SSCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSSCAT

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the status assessment finding as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding Original Result
datasetVariables.name: SSORRES

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from SSORRES in a standard format.
datasetVariables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
datasetVariables.name: SSSTRESC

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate a status assessment was not done. Should be null if a result exists in SSORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: SSSTAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why an assessment was not performed. Example: SUBJECT REFUSED. Used in conjunction with SSSTAT when value is NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Assessment Not Performed
datasetVariables.name: SSREASND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78735

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Used only for results that are subjective (e.g., assigned by a person or a group). Should be null for records that contain collected or derived data. Examples: CAREGIVER, ADJUDICATION COMMITTEE, FRIEND.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: SSEVAL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.VISITNUM

datasetVariables.description: 1. Clinical encounter number.  2. Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Number
datasetVariables.name: VISITNUM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.VISIT

datasetVariables.description: 1. Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter.  2. May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Name
datasetVariables.name: VISIT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.VISITDY

datasetVariables.description: Planned study day of the visit based upon RFSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Study Day of Visit
datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SS.SSDY

datasetVariables.description: 1. Study day of the test, measured as integer days.  2. Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Assessment
datasetVariables.name: SSDY

description: A findings domain that contains general subject characteristics that are evaluated periodically to determine if they have changed. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C117655, 2018-06-29)
label: Subject Status
name: SS
